price: 6. Mpo ete okebisa bato oyo bankonko na bango bakebisamaki te, kasi bazalaki kokanisa te.
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
